Articles.Content:
Hi.

I would like a step-by-step tutorial on going to Duna from LKO with MechJeb 2.0.9.

Thanks in advance!

KvickFlygarn
Doesn't MechJeb have an option to transfer to another body automatically?

I thought that was from a Sun orbit...

I'm trying to get there by my self now.

EDIT: MJ is screwing me over, won't create any nodes :-(

Edited August 25, 2013 by KvickFlygarn87

Doesn't MechJeb have an option to transfer to another body automatically?

Yes it does. Just select Duna as the target, and hit transfer to another planet in the manuver planner while you are in LKO (from LKO is the most efficient). It should transfer automatically, through several burns.

I thought that was from a Sun orbit...

I'm trying to get there by my self now.

EDIT: MJ is screwing me over, won't create any nodes :-(

then don't use MJ like me, i only use kerbal engineer as mod nothing else
